June 11, 1944 D Belle Vue Marching Contest (Class B)
Belle Vue Marching Contest (Class B) 20 March Contest (Music and Inspection Points) Belle Vue Marching Contest belle-vue-marching-contest-class-b
March Contest (Music and Inspection Points)
Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK
Deportment contest held in conjunction with Section A - 1st Barrow Shipyard, 2nd Sheffield Transport, 3rd 22nd Batt West Riding H.G., 4th Bolton Borough. 7 bands competed.
March 2, 2013, 11:13 a.m. Nov. 3, 2013, 8:40 a.m.
1 48th Lancs H.G. Unknown
2 22nd Batt. West Riding H.G.(Brighouse) Unknown
3 Denton Original Unknown
4 Avro Works Unknown
